kaitiakiFeaturesDescription: Liga/desliga os recursos disponíveis para kaitiaki desta comunidade
memberFeaturesDescription: Liga/desliga os recursos disponíveis para membros e kaitiaki desta comunidade
verifiedCredentialsOffHelpText: Activate this setting to accept tribal membership credentials with new registrations
verifiedCredentialsOnHelpText: Turn off this setting if you do not want to accept tribal membership credentials with new registrations
credentialFeaturesDescription: Activate this setting if you would like to issue digital membership credentials to new members
